ISSUE.TITLE: `now-alias` should copy to clipboard?
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I think that'd be kinda cool, to be in line with `now`. - We should also improve the copy and include `[copied to clipboard]`. - Only on ttys

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Add license to satisify warning (#186) This solves the warning seen in `/_logs` all the time: ``` warning package.json: No license field ```
